Chicken_Tikka_Masala.instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt, ginger, and garlic for 2 hours. Grill chicken until browned on both sides. Saute tomato in a pan, then add grilled chicken and cook until tender.

Lamb_Curry.instructions: Cook onion until browned in a pan. Add lamb and cook until browned. Add tomato, coriander, and cumin, and cook until tender.

Fish_Kebab.ingredients: fish, green chili, coriander, lemon juice
Fish_Kebab.instructions: Mix fish, green chili, coriander, and lemon juice in a bowl. Form the mixture into kebabs. Grill kebabs until browned on both sides.

Beef_Bhuna.instructions: Cook onion, ginger, and garlic in a pan until browned. Add beef and cook until browned. Add tomato and cook until tender.

Mutton_Rezala.instructions: Marinate mutton in yogurt, ginger, and garlic for 2 hours. Cook onion until browned in a pan. Add mutton and cook until tender.

Chingri_Bhapa.ingredients: shrimp, coconut milk, green chili, mustard paste
Chingri_Bhapa.instructions: Mix shrimp, coconut milk, green chili, and mustard paste in a bowl. Place the mixture in a steamer and steam for 10 minutes.

Beef_Stew.instructions: Cook onion until browned in a pan. Add beef and cook until browned. Add potato, carrot, tomato, and water. Cover and cook until tender.

Biryani.instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices for 2 hours. Cook onion until browned in a pan. Add chicken and cook until browned. Cook rice separately. Mix chicken and rice together.

Vegetable_Pakora.ingredients: potato, onion, spinach, chickpea flour, spices
Vegetable_Pakora.instructions: Mix potato, onion, and spinach in a bowl. Add chickpea flour and spices to the bowl. Form the mixture into small balls. Fry the balls in hot oil until golden brown.

Chicken_Roast.instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt, ginger, garlic, and spices for 2 hours. Roast the chicken in the oven until cooked through.

Shahi_Tukra.instructions: Cut bread into pieces and fry in hot oil until golden brown. Heat milk, sugar, cardamom, and saffron in a pan. Add fried bread to the pan and cook until the milk is absorbed.

Beef_Bhuna.instructions: Cook onion, ginger, and garlic in a pan until browned. Add beef and cook until browned. Add tomato and cook until tender.

Haleem.instructions: Cook lamb and lentils in a pot with water until tender. Grind wheat and add to the pot. Cook until the mixture is thick. Add spices and cook for another 30 minutes.

Chicken_Karahi.ingredients: chicken, tomatoes, onion, ginger, garlic, spices
Chicken_Karahi.instructions: Cook onion, ginger, and garlic in a pan until browned. Add chicken and cook until browned. Add tomatoes and spices. Cook until the chicken is tender.

Daal_Mash.ingredients: lentils, onion, tomato, ginger, garlic, spices
Daal_Mash.instructions: Cook onion, ginger, and garlic in a pan until browned. Add lentils and cook until tender. Add tomato and spices. Cook for another 10 minutes.

Shahi_Biryani.instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices for 2 hours. Cook onion until browned in a pan. Add chicken and cook until browned. Cook rice separately. Mix chicken and rice together.

Nihari.ingredients: beef, bone marrow, spices, wheat flour
Nihari.instructions: Cook beef in a pot with water and spices until tender. Add bone marrow and wheat flour. Cook until the mixture is thick.

Aloo_Tikki.instructions: Boil potato and mash it. Add onion, chickpea flour, and spices to the mixture. Form the mixture into small patties. Fry the patties in hot oil until golden brown.
